options.content:
Info
Graffiti: ${graffiti} | PubKey: ${pubkey}
Testnet Leaderboard. Phase 2 Ironfish pool Ironfish-api src Ironfish releases
Iron Fish API Iron-fish tutorial Nodes guru ironfish Iron-Fish Community

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("status") FROM "ironfishmonitor" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("hashRate") FROM "ironfishmonitor" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/data' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/mnt/ramdisk' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM ironfishmonitor WITH KEY=host
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM ironfishmonitor WITH KEY=host

list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ironfishmonitor" WITH KEY = "pubkey" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/)  limit 1
list.name: pubkey
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ironfishmonitor" WITH KEY = "pubkey" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/)  limit 1

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ironfishmonitor" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/)  limit 1
list.name: net
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ironfishmonitor" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/)  limit 1
